item.description:
Learn more at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=v&i=547

CT REIA & FCREIA Members: $10
Not-Yet-Members: $20

Walk through a finished REO rehab.

4 BR, 2.5 Baths 2,956 sqft. 3 car garage, New kitchen, SS, Granite, New baths, New plumbing (had freeze damage - most pipes in the house burst but the furnace was fine!) Propane hookup, new hardwood floors, New front stairs, new driveway plus a hot tub.

Plus learn about extra holdings costs - the weather is not cooperating for exterior painting and driveway! Plus the extra cost of heating 2,956 sqft for the winter.

Bring business cards ... lots of networking going on here!

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Fairfield County Real Estate Rehab Subgroup Meeting
